aerosandbox.tools.airfoil_fitter package¶

Submodules¶

aerosandbox.tools.airfoil_fitter.airfoil_fitter module¶

Functions to fit automatic-differentiable models to aerodynamic data from an airfoil. Requires the xfoil package from PyPI; see aerosandbox.geometry for more information on this.

class aerosandbox.tools.airfoil_fitter.airfoil_fitter.AirfoilFitter(airfoil, parallel=True, verbose=True)¶

Bases: object

static fit_weights(x)¶
fit_xfoil_data_Cd(supercritical_Re_threshold=1000000.0, subcritical_Re_threshold=50000.0, plot_fit=True)¶
fit_xfoil_data_Cl(supercritical_Re_threshold=1000000.0, subcritical_Re_threshold=50000.0, plot_fit=True)¶
plot_xfoil_alpha_Re(y_data_name, model=None, params_solved=None, title=None, log_z=False, show=True)¶

See the docstring of the “fit” function in aerosandbox.tools.casadi_tools for syntax. :param model: :param x_data: :param y_data: :param params_solved: :param title: :param show: :return:
